wikipedia_page.main: Peter Christian Massyn Veitch (February 1850 – 1929) was a member of the family of horticulturists who established the renowned family business Veitch Nurseries.

response: The Chelsea business ceased to trade in 1914, whilst the Exeter business continued under Peter Veitch and later his daughter Mildred. She in turn sold the firm in 1969, when it was bought by St Bridget Nurseries. The business was run as a separate business for a further 20 years, but is now a subsidiary of St Bridget.
*Peter Veitch: Visited Australia, South Sea Islands and Borneo from  1875 to 1878
Mildred was the daughter of Peter Veitch and his wife, Harriett Drew.
